Identities.Title: Thermodynamics
Identities.Innate Power: Absolute Zero deals himself either 1 Cold Damage or 1 Fire Damage.
Incapacitated: One hero may use a power.
Select a Hero. Increase the next Damage dealt by that Hero by 2.

Identities.Title: Elemental Wrath
Identities.Innate Power: Absolute Zero deals 1 non-Hero Target 2 Cold Damage.
Incapacitated: One Player may Draw a Card.
One Target deals itself 1 Cold Damage.
Until the start of your next turn, Environment Cards cannot be played.

Identities.Title: Pilot light
Identities.Innate Power: Absolute Zero deals himself 2 Fire Damage. If he takes Damage this way, search your Deck for an Ongoing Card and put it into play. Shuffle your Deck.
Incapacitated: Each target deals itself 1 cold damage
Until the start of your next turn, increase all Damage dealt to and by Targets by 1.

Identities.Title: Violent Shivers
Identities.Innate Power: Until the end of your next turn, increase all Damage dealt to and by Absolute Zero by 2.
Incapacitated: One Player may Play a Card.
Until the start of your next turn, reduce all non-Cold Damage by 1.

Frost-bound Drain.text: Absolute Zero deals 1 non-Hero Target 3 Cold Damage. Absolute Zero deals himself 3 Fire Damage.

Fueled Freeze.text: Destroy up to 3 Ongoing cards. Absolute Zero deals each non-Hero Target X Cold Damage, where X = the number of Ongoing cards destroyed by this card.

Hoarire.text: Absolute Zero deals 1 Target 2 Cold Damage. Absolute Zero deals a second Target 2 Fire Damage. Absolute Zero deals himself 1 Cold Damage and 1 Fire Damage.

Modular Realignment.text: Select 1 Equipment card from your trash and put it either into your hand or into play. Absolute Zero deals himself 1 Fire Damage and 1 Cold Damage.

Onboard Modular Installation.text: You may draw a card. Search your deck for a Module card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck. You may play a card.

Coolant Blast.power: Absolute Zero deals 1 non-Hero Target X Cold Damage, where X = the amount of fire damage that has been dealt to absolute zero since end of your last turn.

Impale.on entry: Play this card next to a non-Hero Target.
Impale.start of turn: At the start of your turn, Absolute Zero deals that Target 2 Cold Damage.
Impale.text: If the Target leaves play, destroy this card.

Sub-zero Atmosphere.text: Any Villain card which would act at the end of the Villain turn instead acts at the start of the Villain turn.

Cold Snap.start of turn: At the start of your turn, Absolute Zero deals each non-Hero Target 1 Cold Damage.

Thermal Shockwave.power: Absolute Zero deals up to 3 Targets 1 Cold Damage each. Absolute Zero deals himself X Fire Damage, where X = the total amount of Cold Damage dealt by Absolute Zero this turn.

Cryo Chamber.text: Cold Damage dealt to Absolute Zero is increased by 1. Fire Damage dealt to Absolute Zero is reduced by 1.
Cryo Chamber.power: Absolute Zero deals himself 5 Fire Damage. Destroy this card.

Focused Aperture.text: Increase Cold Damage dealt by Absolute Zero by 1.

Isothermic Transducer.text: When Absolute Zero is dealt Fire Damage, Absolute Zero deals 1 Target that much Cold Damage.

Null-point Calibration Unit.text: When Absolute Zero would take Cold Damage, he regains that many HP instead.
